'''''Tides Will Guide You Home (I)''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Fontaine: Dance of the Dew-White Springs (I)]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to follow 6 [[Seelie]] in the [[Court of Fontaine Region]], [[Belleau Region]], and [[Beryl Region]] to their Seelie Courts.
